ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Introduction to Shortness of Breath

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: सांस की तकलीफ का परिचय

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Sumit: I… can’t breathe.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Wife: Sumit, are you okay?
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Mr. Bhandari: I couldn’t help but notice that your husband looks a bit out of breath. Is everything alright?
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Wife: I’m not sure, Mr. Bhandari. He seemed fine earlier, but now he’s struggling to catch his breath. I’m a bit worried.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Mr. Bhandari: I know he may not want to make a fuss, but it’s better to be cautious. Sometimes, these things can be more serious than they look.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Wife: Do you think I should take him to the hospital? Because it doesn’t feel right to me.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Mr. Bhandari: Absolutely. When someone is breathless like this, it’s always better to let the professionals have a look, just to be safe. It could be his heart or even his lungs. It’s better to be safe.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Wife: You’re right. I’ll get him to the car and take him in.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Wife: Just hold on, Sumit. We are going to the hospital. You will be alright. Please try to breathe deep and rapidly.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Shortness of breath can be a sign of a life-threatening condition.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: In such moments, quick action is critical. Call for help immediately to ensure timely medical intervention.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: सुमित: मैं ... सांस नहीं ले सकता।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: पत्नी: सुमित, क्या तुम ठीक हो?
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: श्री भंडारी: मैं मदद नहीं कर सकता, लेकिन ध्यान दें कि आपके पति सांस से थोड़ा बाहर दिखते हैं। क्या सब ठीक है?
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: पत्नी: मुझे यकीन नहीं है, श्री भंडारी। वह पहले ठीक लग रहा था, लेकिन अब वह अपनी सांस पकड़ने के लिए संघर्ष कर रहा है। मैं थोड़ा चिंतित हूं।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: श्री भंडारी: मुझे पता है कि वह एक उपद्रव नहीं करना चाहते हैं, लेकिन सतर्क रहना बेहतर है। कभी -कभी, ये चीजें अधिक गंभीर हो सकती हैं जितना वे दिखते हैं।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: पत्नी: क्या आपको लगता है कि मुझे उसे अस्पताल ले जाना चाहिए? क्योंकि यह मेरे लिए सही नहीं है।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: श्री भंडारी: बिल्कुल। जब कोई इस तरह से बेदम होता है, तो हमेशा बेहतर होने के लिए पेशेवरों को एक नज़र रखने देना बेहतर होता है। यह उसका दिल या उसके फेफड़े भी हो सकता है। सुरक्षित होना बेहतर है।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: पत्नी: आप सही हैं। मैं उसे कार में ले जाऊंगा और उसे अंदर ले जाऊंगा।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: पत्नी: बस पकड़ो, सुमित। हम अस्पताल जा रहे हैं। आप ठीक हो जायेंगी। कृपया गहरी और तेजी से सांस लेने का प्रयास करें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: सांस की तकलीफ एक जीवन-धमकाने वाली स्थिति का संकेत हो सकती है।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: ऐसे क्षणों में, त्वरित कार्रवाई महत्वपूर्ण है। समय पर चिकित्सा हस्तक्षेप सुनिश्चित करने के लिए तुरंत मदद के लिए कॉल करें।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Emergency Department

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: आपात विभाग

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: The patient is received in the triage area and his condition is assessed by the attending doctors. Based on the patient’s condition and severity he is triaged into the red zone.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Doctor: What happened?
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Wife: Doctor, he suddenly had difficulty in breathing. We were walking in the park when he stopped and said he couldn’t catch his breath.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Doctor: Has he experienced anything like this before?
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Wife: No, he's never had issues with breathing before.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Doctor: Don’t worry, we’re going to take care of him.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: रोगी को ट्राइएज क्षेत्र में प्राप्त होता है और उसकी स्थिति का आकलन उपस्थित डॉक्टरों द्वारा किया जाता है। रोगी की स्थिति और गंभीरता के आधार पर वह लाल क्षेत्र में ट्राइज़ हो जाता है।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: डॉक्टर: क्या हुआ?
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: पत्नी: डॉक्टर, उसे अचानक सांस लेने में कठिनाई होती है। हम पार्क में चल रहे थे जब वह रुक गया और कहा कि वह अपनी सांस नहीं पकड़ सकता।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: डॉक्टर: क्या उसने पहले भी ऐसा कुछ अनुभव किया है?
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: पत्नी: नहीं, वह पहले कभी सांस लेने के मुद्दे नहीं थे।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: डॉक्टर: चिंता मत करो, हम उसकी देखभाल करने जा रहे हैं।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:g: Triage Area

ns0:target.ns0:g: तिहाई क्षेत्र

ns0:source.ns0:g: Airway, check for obstruction, stridor.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Center" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: वायुमार्ग, रुकावट के लिए जांच, स्ट्रिडर।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: ए

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Red Zone

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: खतरे वाला इलाका

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Center" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Breathing, see if wheezing/crepts, SpO
, oxygen therapy aimed at 94-98% oxygen saturation.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Center" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: श्वास, देखें कि क्या घरघराहट/crepts, spo
, ऑक्सीजन थेरेपी का उद्देश्य 94-98% ऑक्सीजन संतृप्ति है।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: बी

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: C

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: सी

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Center" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Circulation, watch for hypotension or hypertension.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Center" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: परिसंचरण, हाइपोटेंशन या उच्च रक्तचाप के लिए देखें।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Center" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Disability, check neurological status and responsiveness.

ns0:target.ns0:g: विकलांगता, न्यूरोलॉजिकल स्थिति और जवाबदेही की जांच करें।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: D

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: डी

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: E

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:g: Exposure, examine for additional injuries or signs.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Center" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: एक्सपोज़र, अतिरिक्त चोटों या संकेतों के लिए जांच करें।

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: The ABCDE assessment is a systematic approach to identifying and treating life-threatening conditions.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: A Stands for Airway, check for obstruction, stridor.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: B for Breathing, see if wheezing or crepts, SpO
, oxygen therapy aimed at 94-98% oxygen saturation.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: C for Circulation, watch for hypotension or hypertension.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: D for Disability, check neurological status and responsiveness.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: and E for Exposure, examine for additional injuries or signs.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: ABCDE मूल्यांकन जीवन-धमकाने वाली स्थितियों की पहचान और उपचार करने के लिए एक व्यवस्थित दृष्टिकोण है।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: वायुमार्ग के लिए एक स्टैंड, रुकावट के लिए जांच, स्ट्रिडर।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: B सांस लेने के लिए, देखें कि क्या घरघराहट या crepts, spo
, ऑक्सीजन थेरेपी का उद्देश्य 94-98% ऑक्सीजन संतृप्ति है।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: C परिसंचरण के लिए, हाइपोटेंशन या उच्च रक्तचाप के लिए देखें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: D विकलांगता के लिए, न्यूरोलॉजिकल स्थिति और जवाबदेही की जांच करें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: और ई एक्सपोज़र के लिए, अतिरिक्त चोटों या संकेतों के लिए जांच करें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Initial Investigations

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: प्रारंभिक जांच

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Structural brain lesion
: Brain trauma,
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Brain tumor or abscess, Stroke, Hemorrhage

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: संरचनात्मक मस्तिष्क घाव
: मस्तिष्क आघात,
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: ब्रेन ट्यूमर या फोड़ा, स्ट्रोक, हेमोरेज

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: ECG, Chest X-ray, Point of Care USG (POCUS)

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: ईसीजी, चेस्ट एक्स-रे, प्वाइंट ऑफ केयर यूएसजी (पीओसीयूएस)

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Structural brain lesion
: Brain trauma,
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Brain tumor or abscess, Stroke, Hemorrhage

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: संरचनात्मक मस्तिष्क घाव
: मस्तिष्क आघात,
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: ब्रेन ट्यूमर या फोड़ा, स्ट्रोक, हेमोरेज

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Consider CBC, RBS, ABG/VBG, Urea, Creatinine, Electrolytes, TROP-I, D-dimer, NT ProBNP

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style Justification="Left" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: सीबीसी, आरबीएस, एबीजी/वीबीजी, यूरिया, क्रिएटिनिन, इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स, ट्रॉप-आई, डी-डिमर, एनटी प्रोबेंप पर विचार करें

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Conduct a focused history and relevant examination.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

<Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Based on the initial findings, proceed with diagnostic tests such as an ECG, Chest X-ray, and Point of Care Ultrasound (POCUS) to evaluate further.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

<Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Additionally, consider conducting laboratory tests like a Complete Blood Count, Random Blood Sugar, Arterial or Venous Blood Gas, Urea, Creatinine, Electrolytes, Troponin I, D-dimer, and NT-proBNP to provide a comprehensive analysis of the patient's health status.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: एक केंद्रित इतिहास और प्रासंगिक परीक्षा का संचालन करें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

<Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: प्रारंभिक निष्कर्षों के आधार पर, एक ईसीजी, चेस्ट एक्स-रे, और प्वाइंट ऑफ केयर अल्ट्रासाउंड (POCUS) जैसे नैदानिक ​​परीक्षणों के साथ आगे बढ़ने के लिए आगे बढ़ें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

<Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: इसके अतिरिक्त, रोगी की स्वास्थ्य स्थिति का एक व्यापक विश्लेषण प्रदान करने के लिए एक पूर्ण रक्त गणना, यादृच्छिक रक्त शर्करा, यादृच्छिक रक्त शर्करा, धमनी या शिरापरक रक्त गैस, यूरिया, क्रिएटिनिन, इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स, ट्रोपोनिन I, डी-डिमर और एनटी-पीआरओबीएनपी जैसे प्रयोगशाला परीक्षणों पर विचार करें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Line of Treatment for Shortness of Breath

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: सांस की तकलीफ के लिए उपचार की रेखा

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="144" FirstLineMargin="144" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" ListLevel="4" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Cardiac
: Manage as per Pulmonary Oedema Protocol

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="144" FirstLineMargin="144" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" ListLevel="4" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: दिल का
: फुफ्फुसीय एडिमा प्रोटोकॉल के अनुसार प्रबंधित करें

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="36" FirstLineMargin="36" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" ListLevel="1" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Open Sans" FontSize="12" FontIsBold="True" ForegroundColor="#FFFFFF" LinkColor="#FFFFFF" />
ns0:source.ns0:g: Respiratory
: Manage as per Asthma
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="36" FirstLineMargin="36" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" ListLevel="1" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: or COPD Protocol

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="36" FirstLineMargin="36" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" ListLevel="1" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:bpt: <Style FontFamily="Open Sans" FontSize="12" FontIsBold="True" ForegroundColor="#FFFFFF" LinkColor="#FFFFFF" />
ns0:target.ns0:g: श्वसन
: अस्थमा के अनुसार प्रबंधित करें
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="36" FirstLineMargin="36" Justification="Left" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" ListLevel="1" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: या सीओपीडी प्रोटोकॉल

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#FFFFFF" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: These three emergency medical conditions are covered in the subsequent modules.

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#FFFFFF" BulletFont="Arial" /></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: ये तीन आपातकालीन चिकित्सा स्थितियां बाद के मॉड्यूल में शामिल हैं।

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Line of Treatment for Shortness of Breath

ns0:target.ns0:text: सांस की तकलीफ के लिए उपचार की रेखा

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Shortness of breath can have the following reasons:
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="15" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: If the cause is cardiac, manage the condition according to the Pulmonary Oedema Protocol.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="15" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: If the cause is respiratory, manage the condition according to the asthma or the Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Protocol.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="27" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

<Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: These three emergency medical conditions are covered in the subsequent modules.
ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: सांस की तकलीफ में निम्नलिखित कारण हो सकते हैं:
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="15" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: यदि कारण कार्डियक है, तो फुफ्फुसीय एडिमा प्रोटोकॉल के अनुसार स्थिति का प्रबंधन करें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="15" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="Bullet" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: यदि कारण श्वसन है, तो अस्थमा या क्रोनिक ऑब्सट्रक्टिव पल्मोनरी रोग प्रोटोकॉल के अनुसार स्थिति का प्रबंधन करें।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="27" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

<Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: ये तीन आपातकालीन चिकित्सा स्थितियां बाद के मॉड्यूल में शामिल हैं।
ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"><ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: In this course, we have:

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:target.ns0:g: इस पाठ्यक्रम में, हमारे पास है:

ns0:source.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
ns0:source.ns0:g: Learned that shortness of breath is a medical emergency requiring immediate intervention

ns0:target.ns0:ph: <Style LeadingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" DefaultTabStop="69.8181839" LineSpacing="20"><ListStyle ListType="None" BulletChar="•" BulletFont="Arial"><BulletPicture Size="0x0" /></ListStyle></Style>
